15.	 **As a** [role]  
16.	 **I need** [function]  
17.	 **So that** [benefit]  
18.	   
19.	 ### Details and Assumptions
20.	 * [document what you know]
21.	   
22.	 ### Acceptance Criteria  
23.	   
24.	 ```gherkin
25.	 Given [some context]
26.	 When [certain action is taken]
27.	 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
28.	 ```
